message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $1350000. We are confident this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties. We look forward to your consideration.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you and its potential benefits to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and are willing to negotiate further. After careful consideration, we are proposing a revised price of $1250000 for the product. We hope this offer aligns better with your expectations while still maintaining a fair value for us. We look forward to your feedback.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above the number I'm comfortable with. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price for both parties and allows me to make a good deal on this product.

We appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing our costs and the value of the product, we're prepared to consider an offer of $1225000 for the product. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise that respects the value of the product to both you and us. We look forward to your response.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to the value of the product to me as possible. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $1150000. I believe this is a fair price that takes into account the value I'll get from the product.

We understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to accept a price of $1175000 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product to both you and us. We look forward to your acceptance of this offer.
